title: Is it impossible to escape from Akali ?
body: once she ult on me it doesn't matter if i flash twice she still ends up killing me ... so is there a way to escape from Akali Ult ?

replies.body: You can escape, but only if you're riven...

Try running towards her when she is ulting to you. The ult puts her a fair amount behind the target so she will often end up still out of range of you if you do this. Might not always be effective if theres other stuff that you're trying to run away from too, but it can be quite useful for avoiding the second q proc in teamfights or if shes running out of ult charges.
It is possible, you just have to ensure that you wait for her to arrive before flashing over a wall, otherwise she'll go with you.
